column4: anybody here has a Geforce 7600/6600? What's a decent approx. of how many FPS glxgears should give?
I'm getting only approx. 4k FPS with glxgears....
what says   glxinfo  ?
well it says direct rendering is on....
at the beginning of the output... direct rendering... server glx vendor string..
and server glx vendor string: NVIDIA Corporation
and OpenGL renderer string: GeForce 7600 GS/PCI/SSE2
so it has detected my card properly alright...
have you installed nvidia drivers (either from synaptic or from nvidia)?
I they come standard in Ubuntu don't they?
no you have to install nvidia-glx from synaptic then
once it is done you have to   sudo modprobe nvidia  (just in case..) then..
my bad, it's installed already.
sudo nvidia-glx-config enable and then restart your session (ctrl alt return)
it's already enabled.
have you seen nvidia logo when you restarted your session?
no I don't get that.
but I have the nvidia kernel module loaded.
then there is something wrong with your nvidia-glx install
so what to do??
besides trying to purge and then reinstall nvidia-glx , dunno
argh, I had already done sudo nvidia-xconfig obviously :)
